 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּתְגָּם‎</span> **noun masculine** ==edict, decree== (Persian loan-word, Old Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***patigâma***</u></abbr> (<abbr title="transliteration"><u>***patigam***</u></abbr>, ***come to, arrive***), New Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***paigâm***</u></abbr>, ***message***; see Gildem<sup>ZKM iv. 214</sup> [[BDB#Mey|Mey]]<sup>Entstehung 23</sup>; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פִּתְגָּמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***word, command***, Biblical Aramaic = Biblical Hebrew); — construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַטֶּלֶךְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Esth.1.20|Esth 1:20]] with genitive object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲשֵׂה הָרָעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Eccl.8.11|Eccl 8:11]] (apparently f., compare [[BDB#De|De]]; but [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 115</sup> read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲשֶׂה‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַעֲשָׂה‎</span>).
